sentences.sContent: He died in this very room.
sentences.sCn: 他就是在这个房间里去世的。

sentences.sContent: I’ll start at the very beginning.
You’d better start doing some work this very minute (= now, not later ).
sentences.sCn: 你最好现在就开始干点活。

sentences.sContent: That might provoke a riot, the very thing he was trying to avoid.
sentences.sCn: 那可能会激起一场骚乱，而这正是他竭力想要避免的。

sentences.sContent: The very fact that you are reading this book suggests you want to improve your fitness.
sentences.sCn: 你在看这本书正说明了你想改善自己的健康状况。

sentences.sContent: By its very nature, capitalism involves exploitation of the worker.
sentences.sCn: 资本主义最根本的本质就是要剥削劳动者 。

sentences.sContent: His life’s work was being destroyed before his very eyes (= directly in front of him ).
sentences.sCn: 他毕生的成果就在他的眼前被人糟蹋。
